TopicTitle: Why can't we set up fairings midships?

Articles.Content: In the first game, you could connect a fairing to the part above it.   Think of how the Saturn V payload bay is laid out.  In KSP2, this ability seems to be entirely absent.  If I try to connect a fairing to the next part in the stack, it simply deletes the entire fairing.
I haven't played around with them yet but I think that's what the "tube" parts are for.
You can do this with fairings in KSP2.  The UI needs a lot of work, but if you line it up with the part above it and press the green check, it works.
